name: FindingCommonBattleGrounds
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Political discussions in the US have gotten a bit out of hand. What if we focused on where we agree instead of attacking people when we disagree? That’s the goal of our podcast – Finding Common (Battle) Grounds. And the “battle” in the middle? If we can find common ground, then we can work together to fight all the lunacy that surrounds us, like QAnon, North Korea, Disney, and the Kardashians.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
